snippet: Facing their first glimpse of adversity since the playoffs began, the Kings say they will stick with what has worked as they try to finish off the Devils.
abstract: Analysis; Los Angeles Kings, facing their first glimpse of adversity since the NHL playoffs began, say they will stick with what has worked as they try to finish off New Jersey Devils in Game 6 of Stanley Cup finals.
lead_paragraph: Facing their first glimpse of adversity since the playoffs began, the Kings say they will stick with what has worked as they try to finish off the Devils.

headline.seo: Kings Tripped Up by Final Victory
headline.main: Used to Winning With Ease, Kings Tripped Up by Final Victory
headline.print_headline: Kings Learn Hardest Part Is Writing An Ending
